data.price: Ẹ wá oore (Allāhu) pẹ̀lú sùúrù¹ àti ìrun kíkí. Dájúdájú ó lágbára (láti ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀) àyàfi fún àwọn olùpáyà (Allāhu),
data.arabic: وَٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ
data.footnotes: 1. Mẹ́ta ni sùúrù yìí pín sí. Ìkíní: Dídúró ṣinṣin nínú ẹ̀sìn ’Islām. Ìkejì: Ṣíṣe ìfaradà lórí àdánwò àti níní àtẹ̀mọ́ra ìnira. Ìkẹta: Sísá fún ẹ̀ṣẹ̀.

dua.name: Dua for Patience and Perseverance
dua.significanceReason: Emphasizes the power of patience, seeking divine support during challenging and trying times.
